Package index

All functions

aes()
Aesthetic mapping with positional z support
apply_perspective()
Apply perspective effect to 3D points
apply_quantization()
Apply quantization to continuous lighting values
apply_surface_lighting()
Apply lighting models to surface normals
blend_lighting_with_colors()
Blend lighting values with base colors using HSV or HSL color spaces
calculate_pillar_face_normals()
Calculate normals for pillar faces
calculate_positional_light_directions()
Calculate per-face light directions for positional lighting
calculate_surface_face_centers()
Calculate face centers for positional lighting
calculate_voxel_face_centers()
Calculate face centers for voxel faces
calculate_voxel_face_normals()
Calculate normals for voxel faces
compute_light_dot_products()
Compute dot products between normals and light direction
compute_lighting()
Apply lighting models to surface normals with positional light support
compute_normal_rgb_lighting()
Compute normal-to-RGB mapping with light direction rotation
compute_surface_normals()
Compute surface normals from face gradients
coord_3d()
3D coordinate system
create_grid_quads()
Create quadrilateral faces from grid data
create_grid_segments()
Create grid segments for rendering
create_pillars()
Create pillar faces from grid data
create_voxels()
Create voxel faces from 3D sparse data
element_rect()
Rectangle theme element with alpha support
extract_aesthetic_vars()
Extract variable names from aesthetic mappings
fit_and_predict()
Fit and predict with 3D smoothing models
generate_circle_vertices()
Generate circle vertices in 3D space for a given face
generate_point_elements()
Generate reference elements with simplified approach
geom_point_3d()
3D scatter plot with depth-based size scaling and reference projections
geom_polygon_3d()
3D polygon geometry with depth sorting
geom_smooth_3d()
3D smoothing geometry
get_scale_names()
Get axis name for a single scale with proper fallback hierarchy
hsl2rgb()
Convert HSL to RGB color space
is_theme_void_like()
Check if theme is void-like (has multiple key elements set to element_blank)
lighting()
Create lighting specification for 3D surface rendering
make_scale_grid()
Generate grid data using actual scale breaks with aspect ratio
normalize_light_direction()
Normalize light direction vector
points_to_circles()
Convert ref_circle points to circular polygons
position_on_face()
Position for projecting 2D and 3D layers onto 3D cube faces
process_surface_grid()
Process regular grid data into 3D surface with lighting
rgb2hsl()
Convert RGB to HSL color space
rotate_3d()
Rotate points in 3D space
scale_to_standard()
Scale data to standard domain with aspect ratio control
scale_z_continuous()
Continuous z-axis scale for 3D plots
scale_z_discrete()
Discrete z-axis scale for 3D plots
stat_density_3d()
3D kernel density estimation surface
stat_function_3d()
3D function surface visualization
stat_hull_3d()
Create 3D convex and alpha hulls with lighting
stat_identity_3d()
3D-aware identity transformation
stat_pillar_3d()
3D pillar visualization from grid data
stat_point_3d()
3D-aware point transformation with reference lines and points
stat_smooth_3d()
3D smooth surface from scattered data
stat_surface_3d()
3D surface from regular grid data
stat_voxel_3d()
3D voxel visualization from sparse 3D data
transform_3d_standard()
Transform 3D points using rotation and optional perspective with viewpoint distance
validate_position_stat()
Validate stat compatibility with position_on_face
zlim()
Set z-axis limits
